name: Untitled Dungeon Crawler (Trolez)
description:
An untitled dungeon crawling RPG that is still in its very early development. This game is heavily inspired by one of my favorite games, Wizardry 8 that I've spent many hours playing in my youth and still return to now and then.

I'm one guy working on this in my spare time. Realistically, this game won't ever be fully finished, but who knows. If there is any real interest, I might be inclined to put more work into this :)

The video below shows a prototype of the combat system in the game.
